item.title: Change Apache’s Default User www-data or Home Directory /var/www/
item.description: I was getting errors from StarCluster run due to not being able to find .starcluster directory in /var/www/. This directory has config file and log directories for StarCluster so without it, it can’t run. To solve the issue, I set up my own user in Apache envvars instead of www-data which also changes default home directory to mine. item.title: Getting Started with Your AWS Instance and Installing and Setting Up an Apache Server
